author: David Freedlander
title: When New York Needed Him Most, Bill de Blasio Had His Worst Week As Mayor
description: Misinformation, policy reversals, and that inexplicable trip to the Park Slope Y.
content: For the vast majority of New Yorkers, life is going on pretty normally right now, Bill de Blasio said on Morning Joe March 10, as the number of confirmed coronavirus cases in the U.S. topped 1,000. We want to encourage that. He added that there was a misperce… [+8818 chars]
